TinyRoadBook beta

“A small road map editor for bigger adventures...”

  • Home
  • Editor
  • Settings

Minimalist road book editor

Why having a too detailed road book when looking for adventure? This application simply allows you to extract city names with just few click on a map then freely edit your road book as you see fit. You're ready to leave in minutes and that's all that matters!

directions_bike

Cycle route planner

You are planning a bike tour? This application is provided with the Opencyclemap bikemap and the Lonvia cycling layer. Just follow one of the official bike routes to plan your epic bike trip.

gps_fixed

GPX viewer

You'd like to preview your route to simplify your roadbook edition? Just download a GPX file from a GPS track sharing website and select it from settings. Your road will show up on the map.

Start now Quick tour

This application is powered by Open Street Map and the fair use Nominatim geocoding web service. You can send your comments, suggestions, bug reports and other messages via this contact form. A small contribution would be very appreciate to promote a "real" hosting/domain and for my daily pittance.
Made with by a broke bike tour enthusiast

Picker
Text to append after each insertion. It can be a comma, a line break or whatever.

This may reduce name extraction speed.
